name: PIT Wars
description:
A classic capture the flag map inspired by the old 2Fort style maps from the original Team Fortress. My first map using CORE, made for Arenas of Combat - Level Design Contest, category Urban.

First team to score 4 captures wins the match or highest score after the 15-minute time-limit.
Choice of weapons (Sniper, Rocket Launcher, Grenade Launcher or Automatic Rifle) to match your play style: snipe, run-n-gun, attack, defend, or support.
Minimum players set to 1 so you can have a look around.

Mainly uses Core Content based on the Core capture the flag framework with some tweaks. Thanks to the following for the Community Content used:
Health pack made by Anthony (Dev_Anthony#6986)
Weapon Spawner made by WaveParadigm
Ladders made by Kirch
Unequip after respawn script by DanEld
